mapper.insert: insert into user_order(order_no, stuff_type, send_address, status, receive_address, order_time) values (#{orderNo}, #{stuffType}, #{sendAddress}, #{status}, #{receiveAddress}, #{orderTime});
mapper.update: update user_order set stuff_type=#{stuffType}, send_address=#{sendAddress}, receive_address=#{receiveAddress}, status=#{status}, order_time=#{orderTime} where order_no = #{orderNo};
